title: â€˜Saare mulle kaate jayenge, Ram Ram chillayengeâ€™ ('When we slaughter all the Muslims, they will scream the name of Ram') - Bajrang Dal in Hisar, Haryana, has given an ultimatum of 2 days for Muslims to leave or face the consequences. Video:
selftext:
Source: Twitter handle of Zakir Ali, The Wire Hindi journalist 

https://twitter.com/zakiralityagi/status/1687018152411254784?s=46&t=2TSyKDcpXaQBQU4_CyTmzw
comments: How  are  all our institutions silent on  this open callout for human Slaughter  ðŸ¤” .Feels like I'm watch some Taliban shit at this point ..
Terrorism
what happened to supreme court? they released order to take action on hate speech but now remain silent.
Relax, people, this is just part of Modi's "pasmanda" "outreach."

The same people are protecting Monu Manesar.

Remember what bjp did when they were threatened by Amritpal, but there is literally no efforts from the govt to capture Monu because he fits with their narrative.
I want to say that this is Gujrat Model, but this is the BJP model.
BJP ko 2024 ka darr hai.. isliye ab desh me bs hindu musalman hoga. 10 saal me kaam kiya nhi.. hindu religion ke naam pe vote mange jaenge...
Thatâ€™s genocide with extra steps.
Even the Hindu voters are to be blamed for falling for this hatred and enabling genocide mongers.

> Source: Twitter handle of Zakir Ali, The Wire Hindi journalist.   
    
Haryana Police: Quick! File some cases against him! How dare he disturb the peace????
Ky ek Hindu apne desh me shanti se genocide bhi nahi kar sakta? Whats the uproar about
As Naseeruddin Shah said in interview with Karan Thapar 'there will be civil war in this country'.
I believe the name is Bharat todo yatra
Did I wake up to 1697? I thought 2023 chal raha tha
Dumb fcuks like Sai Deepak j*rk off to this content.

Some people in our country are seriously f'ed up in their brain. It's pathetic to see the North/Hindi Belt of India in such a pathetic state. No wonder people have been gaining courage in demanding up of splitting up of our nation.

People can be such idiots. My phd father was telling me yesterday that the rpf guy was not targeting muslims as he killed 2 hindus and 2 muslims (his eyes read this in Times of India, now the fucker has started seeing things that fit his narrative)

If a civil war happens, most of the country and its allies will side with the oppressors. We already have a huge number of status quo warriors ready to back the oppression of minorities in this country and itâ€™s not going to change unless something radical happens.
ðŸ—¿ðŸ—¿

Same my father who has retired from central govt,was a lifelong Communist party supporter and has never supported hindutva agenda has now started acting like a bhakt. I was shocked that how can someone who has been a left supporter his entire life has suddenly become RW supporter. Then I saw the messages in his phone and understood quickly that he joined a WhatsApp group in which there hate machine going on 24*7. It's the social media and the godi media which has turned people's hatred by fuelling fire with their propaganda(although we don't watch godi media channels at all bcoz I know the shit godi media runs on its channels). But it's the social media which has turned sane people into andhbhakts through their hate and propaganda which has targeted people from every age group.

1 senior officer and 3 muslims on the basis of their identity. The senior also belonged to ST caste and the words that rpf guy sopke after killing those three muslims were " media has shown the truth . Only modi and yogi are two options"
Try telling this to my father

Man I'm scared of living in this country now. Thank fuck I'm in the South and it's relatively less crazy down here but it's only a matter of time the cancer spreads down here too. Fuck religion man. If you must kill another to protect your religion, you probably should consider killing yourself. Brain dead trolls
I don't ram would like this

You guys are forgetting one thing. 
They can create as many riots as they want and kill more of the minorities, but they'll still win. Because Ayodhya.
Basically a get out of jail free card
Is this AdLonely our Critfin?
Yep
